Late Nite DCL Inbound

Description:

The Late Nite Downtown Center-Leroy St Inbound leaves Downtown Binghamton - State & Hawley Streets and travels through Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton and Riverside Drive in Binghamton & Johnson City enroute to campus.


Reminder: All Late Nite buses at State & Hawley Street return to campus.

Operation Time:

Friday and Saturday: 12:00 A.M. to 3:20 A.M.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the Late Nite DCL Outbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.

② Leroy & Murray Streets
